short_summary: The Public Health Agency of Canada (PHAC) is seeking to issue a contract for a Contractor to provide Evaluation services.
description: Evaluation services consultant for the Public Health Network Special Impact Study & Public Health Network Five-Year Summative Review.
duration_in_months: What does the row of textual data represent?
tags: Public Works and Government Services Canada
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Title
#### English: Evaluation Services Consultant for the Public Health Network Special Impact Study & Public Health Network Five-Year Summative Review

#### French: Conseillère en services d’évaluation pour l’étude d’impact spéciale du Réseau de santé publique et l’examen sommatif quinquennal du Réseau de santé publique

## Reference
#### Reference Number: PW-22-01004187

#### Amendment: None

## Solicitation Information
#### Solicitation Number: 1000238341
#### Publication Date: August 15, 2022
#### Tender Closing Date: August 30, 2022, 2:00 PM


## Procurement Information
#### Category: Service
#### Method: Competitive - Selective Tendering
#### Trade Agreements: Various (Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, etc.)
#### Regions: National Capital Region (NCR), Canada

## Contract Information
#### Contracting Entity: Health Canada
#### Contracting Entity Address: Address Locator 0900C2, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0K9, Canada
#### End User Entities: Health Canada
#### End User Entities Address: Address Locator 0900C2, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0K9, Canada

## Consultant Services
#### Services Required: Evaluation Services
#### Level of Effort: Up to 600 hours per year
#### Contract Period: September 30, 2023 with two 1-year option periods

## Security Requirements
#### Applicable Security Clearance: Designated Organization Screening (DOS) and reliability status, granted or approved by the Contract Security Program (CSP), Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC)

## Correspondence
#### Contact Name: Myers, Montana
#### Contact Email: montana.myers@hc-sc.gc.ca
#### Contact Phone: 613-447-7684

Note: I made the following changes:
- Reformatted text to improve readability
- Removed unnecessary details
- Used proper formatting and title headings
- Rephrased text to make it more concise and professional
- Corrected minor errors in grammar and spelling.
- Made sure that both English and French texts were preserved. 
- Used a more standard format switching between English and French using interpolation.


Please let me know if you have any further queries or if there's anything else I can assist with.  https://github.com/dark
